adjectives.description: dithyrambic (comparative more dithyrambic, superlative most dithyrambic)

entries.meaning: Of, pertaining to, or resembling a dithyramb; especially, passionate, intoxicated with enthusiasm.
examples: The dithyrambic chorus is a chorus of transformed people, for whom their social past, their civic position, is entirely forgotten.
As we have no remains of the dithyrambics of the ancients, we cannot exactly ascertain the measure.
